SELECT JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.product_name') AS product,
           JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.list_price') AS price
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://hallincdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/hallinc/raw/csv/products/*.json',
        FORMAT = 'csv',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) WITH (doc NVARCHAR(MAX)) as rows
